verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, keep me near the cross, There a precious fountain Free to all--a healing stream, Flows from Calv’ry’s mountain.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: In the cross, in the cross, Be my glory ever; Till my raptured soul shall find Rest beyond the river.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Near the cross, a trembling soul, Love and mercy found me; There the Bright and Morning Star Sheds its beams around me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Near the cross! O Lamb of God, Bring its scenes before me; Help me walk from day to day, With its shadows o’er me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Near the cross I’ll watch and wait Hoping, trusting ever, Till I reach the golden strand, Just beyond the river.
